changelog.title: TimeTogether
items: **TimeTogether** is a brand new online database for storing timezones of multiple users. What that means? Means that users logged in the service can store their own timezones and then other users can get them without having to get yours.

**This service took many hours to design and make**. From making the API, the login service, the UI, and even the integration with this plugin took a lot of time. And i am very proud of the result, specifically considering that it is my first project with Express.js. I hope that you guys enjoy the service!
If you didn't liked it at all, you can disable it by going in `Settings > TimeTogether` and disabling it

changelog.title: H
items: Added a new item to the context menu to get the timezone from the TimeTogether and add in the local user list
**Customizable timer display format**. Now you can display the timer as how you always want. (BTW I guess I gave too much power to you)
You can see a user's timezone in the member and DM user lists and header
